author: emanueledimarco
body:
This PR introduces a new object, EcalPulseSymmCovariance, which reduces the memory allocation because this covariance matrix is a symmetric one.
To leave backward compatibility with the old object (EcalPulseShapeCovariance) the object is new in CondFormats/EcalObjects.

The tools that refer to it (CondCore/EcalPlugins and CondTools/Ecal) are not duplicated, just moved to use the new object. 

A PR with its usage in the ECAL local reconstruction will follow when the GT will be ready. 
Everything is validated with a local sqlite file. 

@bendavid @argiro @cerminar @diguida @ggovi please also follow this.
title: ECAL MultiFit: symmetric Pulse Shape Covariance Matrix DB object
